description:
Shiitare becomes a traveling performer.  The lightning likes to eat people`s belly-buttons. A faithful daughter falls to her death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shiitare Is a Thief / The Lightning`s Favorite Belly-Button / Maiden Pass
Shiitare wa Nusutto / Kaminari no Suki na Heso / Otome Touge
しいたれは ぬすっと / かみなりのすきなへそ / 乙女峠
